attributes.action: Stop members from claiming Utilities and taxes on their expenses.
attributes.additional_details: This will make them fully aware of the situation we all have to live with on a daily basis.
attributes.background: Members of Parliament should not be allowed to claim gas, electric, water expenses or Council Tax. They should be subject to the same Cost of Living as the voters.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk
